code: import React from'react';import{Flex,Text}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import{BetPosition}from'state/types';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import{formatUsd}from'../History/helpers';import PositionTag from'../PositionTag';import{LockPriceHistoryRow,PrizePoolHistoryRow,RoundResultBox}from'./styles';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RoundResult=_ref=>{let{round,children,...props}=_ref;const{lockPrice,closePrice,totalAmount}=round;const betPosition=closePrice>lockPrice?BetPosition.BULL:BetPosition.BEAR;const isPositionUp=betPosition===BetPosition.BULL;const{t}=useTranslation();const priceDifference=closePrice-lockPrice;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(RoundResultBox,{betPosition:betPosition,...props,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{color:"textSubtle",fontSize:"12px",bold:true,textTransform:"uppercase",mb:"8px",children:t('Closed Price')}),round.failed?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{bold:true,textTransform:"uppercase",color:"textDisabled",mb:"16px",fontSize:"24px",children:t('Canceled')}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"space-between",mb:"16px",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{color:isPositionUp?'success':'failure',bold:true,fontSize:"24px",children:formatUsd(closePrice)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PositionTag,{betPosition:betPosition,children:formatUsd(priceDifference)})]}),lockPrice&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LockPriceHistoryRow,{lockPrice:lockPrice}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PrizePoolHistoryRow,{totalAmount:totalAmount}),children]});};export default RoundResult;
